attributes.action: Turn back on our street lights all night in uttlesford
attributes.background: Our street lighting turns off at midnight. Due to recent rising crime in our area we want the street lighting turned back on all night for our safety and fear of crime

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This is the responsibility of your local authority.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
